alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 1:11PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ROAN AND TAVAPUTS PLATEAUS... FLAT TOPS...LOWER YAMPA RIVER BASIN...AND CENTRAL YAMPA RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds in excess of 50 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 111 PM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Rangely to 31 miles west of Meeker to 27 miles northwest of Parachute and moving east at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Meeker around 215 PM MST. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 16 and 60. Colorado 13 between mile markers 20 and 49. Colorado 64 between mile markers 27 and 73. Colorado 318 near mile marker 60. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
